counter.documentation: Description: Maximum utilization of uplink resource block symbols in ROP sampled every 1 second. Unit: N/A Trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all UL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available UL resource block symbols in 1 second.
counter.description: Maximum utilization of uplink resource block symbols in ROP sampled every 1 second. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all UL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available UL resource block symbols in 1 second.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for uplink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when UL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - As SRS in symbols of guard band.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for uplink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when UL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - As SRS in symbols of guard band.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for CSI-RS, TRS, and CSI-IM during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for CSI-RS, including TRS and CSI-IM. Truncation of (Number of resource element symbols / 12) is equal to number of resource block symbols.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for CSI-RS, TRS, and CSI-IM during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for CSI-RS, including TRS and CSI-IM. Truncation of (Number of resource element symbols / 12) is equal to number of resource block symbols.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of detected CBRA Msg1 preambles. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped at each received preamble.
counter.description: Number of detected CBRA Msg1 preambles. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped at each received preamble.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of active UE instances that have DRB data in UE-dedicated downlink buffer. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.
counter.description: Number of active UE instances that have DRB data in UE-dedicated downlink buffer. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times a UE Context Setup procedure fails in gNodeB-DU because UE capability does not match NRCellDU capability. Trigger: Stepped when UE Context Setup fails due to an unsuccessful UE capability check.
counter.description: Number of times a UE Context Setup procedure fails in gNodeB-DU because UE capability does not match NRCellDU capability.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE Context Setup fails due to an unsuccessful UE capability check.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling downlink of DRB since last scheduled DRB (delta time between scheduling occasions). Meanwhile, there is data in buffer. Unit: 125 us Trigger: First scheduling occasion for new packet arriving to empty DRB buffer is excluded. Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer is excluded. HARQ retransmission is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling downlink of DRB since last scheduled DRB (delta time between scheduling occasions). Meanwhile, there is data in buffer. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: First scheduling occasion for new packet arriving to empty DRB buffer is excluded. Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer is excluded. HARQ retransmission is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of downlink DRB, while there is data in buffer. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Following cases are excluded: - First scheduling occasion for new packet arriving to an empty DRB buffer. - Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer. - HARQ retransmission. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of downlink DRB, while there is data in buffer. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Following cases are excluded: - First scheduling occasion for new packet arriving to an empty DRB buffer. - Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer. - HARQ retransmission. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PUSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PUSCH mapping type A.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PUSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PUSCH mapping type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink. Unit: bytes Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received from DRBs and SRBs when cell is used as PCell or SCell.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received from DRBs and SRBs when cell is used as PCell or SCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Transfer time of restricted uplink data volume. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped from reception of first MAC PDU in a burst until reception of second last slot.
counter.description: Transfer time of restricted uplink data volume. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped from reception of first MAC PDU in a burst until reception of second last slot.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots with downlink PDSCH scheduling activity. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where there is at least one SRB or DRB PDSCH scheduling activity. Other scheduling activities are excluded.
counter.description: Total duration of slots with downlink PDSCH scheduling activity. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where there is at least one SRB or DRB PDSCH scheduling activity. Other scheduling activities are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Total number of uplink samples made for pmEbsActiveUeUlSum. Unit: N/A Trigger: One sample is taken each slot, regardless if UE is active or not.
counter.description: Total number of uplink samples made for pmEbsActiveUeUlSum. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: One sample is taken each slot, regardless if UE is active or not.

counter.documentation: Description: Total number of downlink samples made for pmEbsActiveUeDlSum. Unit: N/A Trigger: One sample is taken each slot, regardless if UE is active or not.
counter.description: Total number of downlink samples made for pmEbsActiveUeDlSum. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: One sample is taken each slot, regardless if UE is active or not.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS without DRX impact and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in an empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS without DRX impact and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in an empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB data in UE dedicated downlink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A Trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.
counter.description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB data in UE dedicated downlink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.

counter.documentation: Description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.administrativeState, or another MO the cell depends on, is locked by operator. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds Trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.
counter.description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.administrativeState, or another MO the cell depends on, is locked by operator. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds
counter.trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A broadcasting during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A broadcasting. Counts DL resource block symbols used for Synchronization Signal (SS) PBCH, BCCH, and PCCH including SIBs and Random Access (RA) Msg2.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A broadcasting during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A broadcasting. Counts DL resource block symbols used for Synchronization Signal (SS) PBCH, BCCH, and PCCH including SIBs and Random Access (RA) Msg2.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB or SRB data in UE uplink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A Trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.
counter.description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB or SRB data in UE uplink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS without DRX and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS without DRX and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type B during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each uplink resource block symbol used by PUSCH type B.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type B during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each uplink resource block symbol used by PUSCH type B.

counter.documentation: Description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.serviceStatus is set to OUT_OF_SERVICE. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds Trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.
counter.description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.serviceStatus is set to OUT_OF_SERVICE. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds
counter.trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: The following cases are excluded: - HARQ initial transmission in last slot of burst. - HARQ initial transmission in single burst. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: The following cases are excluded: - HARQ initial transmission in last slot of burst. - HARQ initial transmission in single burst. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink as part of a burst while being restricted by air interface. Data volume received in last slot in burst is excluded. Unit: byte Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, and it results in a data burst. Volume received in last slot is excluded.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink as part of a burst while being restricted by air interface. Data volume received in last slot in burst is excluded. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, and it results in a data burst. Volume received in last slot is excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of utilization for uplink resource block symbols averaged over 1 second. Unit: N/A Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..5] % Bin[1]: [6..10] % Bin[2]: [11..15] % Bin[3]: [16..20] % Bin[4]: [21..25] % Bin[5]: [26..30] % Bin[6]: [31..35] % Bin[7]: [36..40] % Bin[8]: [41..45] % Bin[9]: [46..50] % Bin[10]: [51..55] % Bin[11]: [56..60] % Bin[12]: [61..65] % Bin[13]: [66..70] % Bin[14]: [71..75] % Bin[15]: [76..80] % Bin[16]: [81..85] % Bin[17]: [86..90] % Bin[18]: [91..95] % Bin[19]: [96..100] % Trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all UL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available UL resource block symbols in 1 second.
counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all UL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available UL resource block symbols in 1 second.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE instances considered active in uplink direction. UE is considered to have DRB or SRB data in its buffer. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.
counter.description: Number of UE instances considered active in uplink direction. UE is considered to have DRB or SRB data in its buffer. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.

counter.documentation: Description: Maximum utilization of downlink resource block symbols in ROP sampled every 1 second. Unit: N/A Trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all DL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available DL resource block symbols in 1 second.
counter.description: Maximum utilization of downlink resource block symbols in ROP sampled every 1 second. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all DL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available DL resource block symbols in 1 second.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully detected random access Msg3 messages for CBRA. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped at each successful detection of Msg3.
counter.description: Number of successfully detected random access Msg3 messages for CBRA. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped at each successful detection of Msg3.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PDSCH. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where PDSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PDSCH. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where PDSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of utilization for downlink resource block symbols averaged over 1 second. Unit: N/A Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..5] % Bin[1]: [6..10] % Bin[2]: [11..15] % Bin[3]: [16..20] % Bin[4]: [21..25] % Bin[5]: [26..30] % Bin[6]: [31..35] % Bin[7]: [36..40] % Bin[8]: [41..45] % Bin[9]: [46..50] % Bin[10]: [51..55] % Bin[11]: [56..60] % Bin[12]: [61..65] % Bin[13]: [66..70] % Bin[14]: [71..75] % Bin[15]: [76..80] % Bin[16]: [81..85] % Bin[17]: [86..90] % Bin[18]: [91..95] % Bin[19]: [96..100] % Trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all DL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available DL resource block symbols in 1 second.
counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all DL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available DL resource block symbols in 1 second.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of successfully transmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell or SCell. Unit: bytes Trigger: All successfully transmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. Cell can be PCell or SCell. Msg4 is excluded. Bandwidth-reduced UE instances are excluded.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of successfully transmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell or SCell. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: All successfully transmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. Cell can be PCell or SCell. Msg4 is excluded. Bandwidth-reduced UE instances are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where at least one MAC SDU is received on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where at least one MAC SDU is successfully received.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where at least one MAC SDU is received on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where at least one MAC SDU is successfully received.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of CBRA Msg2 scheduling attempts. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped at each Msg2 scheduling attempt.
counter.description: Number of CBRA Msg2 scheduling attempts. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped at each Msg2 scheduling attempt.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for downlink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when DL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - Regardless of being used for DL transmission or not.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for downlink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when DL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - Regardless of being used for DL transmission or not.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: HARQ initial transmission in single-burst and in last slot of burst is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: HARQ initial transmission in single-burst and in last slot of burst is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where PUSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where PUSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.
